mcq.statement: Who was the eighth last Viceroy of India, serving from 1910 to 1916?
mcq.one_liner: The eighth last Viceroy of India, serving from 1910 to 1916, was **Lord Hardinge of Penshurst**.

suggestions.topic: Calcutta to Delhi Shift / Annulment of Partition (1911)
Calcutta to Delhi Shift / Annulment of Partition (1911)
